actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs (Subsequently: Energy and Natural Resources)
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs (Subsequently: Energy and Natural Resources).

official_title: A bill to provide for the suspension of annual assessment work on mining claims held by location in the United States.

summary.text: Suspends until July 1, 1980, the requirement that $100 worth of labor or improvements be performed annually on all mining claims filed under applicable mineral leasing laws.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the suspension of annual assessment work on mining claims held by location in the United States.
